name: Cave of Lexip
description:
After wandering through the jungle for what feels like at least half a day, you stumble upon the legendary Cave of Lexip. This cave is said to contain an infinite amount of precious gems...but also a terrible curse.

Cave of Lexip is my entry to the first Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Gam, with the theme of "Permanence". Jump, double-jump and wall-jump through the cave to snag as many gems as you can, but watch out where you land! The curse will cause spikes to rise out of the ground and stay there...permanently.

Press C, Space or arrow up to jump. Move with the arrow keys or WASD. Joypads supported.
